name: Post Party Panic
description:
SA GAME JAM  Sponsored By Free Lives "We are on our way home, hey what's that noi..." - dad. 

You've got 10 minutes till your parents arrive and there's still so much to cleanup. Don't fret just dispose of your trash and guests using crude language, magic windows and sick beats to keep you motivated.

If only it was this easy in real life, just think how many bussin' ragers you'd throw!

Open Window Students Entry -72 hour Jam Submission- CONTRIBUTORS: FIRST YEARS:

Android28 3D Art

Jo van Vuuren Sound and Music

SECOND YEARS:

Marius Geldenhuys Creative Lead / Level Designer / UI / 3D Art

Daniel Beale Developer

Marnus-Koek 3D Art / Character Design / Sound

JohnOwhin Developer / 3D Art

Rudi Naudè 3D Art / Developer

How to play:

Chuck party evidence out windows and chase away your guests by swearing them into oblivion.

Install Instructions:

Download and run executable 

or 

download and extract the ZIP to run the EXE.
